body: say you have a reviewing tag, how long will it be a reviewing tag? when are interviews?
body_tagged: say you have a reviewing tag, how long will it be a reviewing tag? when are interviews?
title: staff applications i need help

replies.body: just be patient, it will vary, could be a day, or it could be a week, or who knows how long or short.
replies.body_tagged: just be patient, it will vary, could be a day, or it could be a week, or who knows how long or short.

replies.body: You need to wait till 3 members of senior staff agree on your application.
replies.body_tagged: You need to wait till 3 members of senior staff agree on your application.

replies.body: What they said ^ Be patient for the three other staff to view your application!
replies.body_tagged: What they said ^ Be patient for the three other staff to view your application!
